DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Akreos Toric IOL follow cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Akreos Toric Intraocular Lens .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must willing able provide write consent EC approve Informed Consent form . Subjects must require lens power 15 30 diopter . Subjects anterior segment pathology extracapsular phacoemulsification cataract surgery would contraindicate . Subjects corneal pathology potentially affect topography .
